titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Wayne R. Leitner Drawings, 1978-1981
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, 2012

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Pen and ink drawings and posters created by Leitner for Vassar College events and publications while he was a student.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Wayne R. Leitner graduated with Vassar College's Class of 1981

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: 12 Pen and ink drawings and posters created by Leitner for Vassar College events and publications while he was a student.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Librarywithout any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Unknown. Presumably a gift of Wayne R. Leitner.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Wayne R. Leitner Posters, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
